mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_PERMISSION( pId, icon, name, permission, url, sort, isMenu, isEnable ) VALUES ( #{pId}, #{icon}, #{name}, #{permission}, #{url}, #{sort}, #{isMenu}, #{isEnable} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_PERMISSION a SET a.`pId` = #{pId}, a.`icon` = #{icon}, a.`name` = #{name}, a.`permission` = #{permission}, a.`url` = #{url}, a.`sort` = #{sort}, a.`isMenu` = #{isMenu}, a.isEnable = #{isEnable} WHERE a.`id` = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.pId, p.name, p.permission, p.url, p.icon, p.isMenu, p.sort FROM SYS_PERMISSION p
INNER JOIN SYS_RE_ROLE_PERMISSION rp ON p.id = rp.permissionId INNER JOIN SYS_ROLE r ON r.id = rp.roleId AND r.isEnable = 1 INNER JOIN SYS_RE_USER_ROLE ur ON ur.roleId = r.id
WHERE 1 = 1 AND p.isEnable = 1
AND ur.userId = #{userId}
ORDER BY p.pId ASC, p.sort asc

SELECT p.permission FROM SYS_PERMISSION p INNER JOIN SYS_RE_ROLE_PERMISSION a ON p.id = a.permissionId AND p.isEnable = 1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.roleId = #{roleId}
